nls.description: TSO: Idea approval workflow. After approval, selected ideas are converted to projects. For POCs, this always go to an approval.
nls.name: Idea Approval POC

nls.description: Makes sure Type, Category, and Business Owner, are filled in. If cost is greater than a threshold filter ($10K), check to see if BRD is filled out, otherwise approve. If Fast Track is checked, bypass approval.
nls.name: Validate fields and Submission Criteria

nls.description: The appropriate approvers are to go over documentation from BRD and validate.
nls.name: Await Project Approval

message.name: Please review idea: ${thisIdea.name}

nls.description: Identify the size of the project based on form information and create using corresponding template.
nls.name: Determine Project Template

Condition.ExpressionText: ( idea.thisIdea.obj_request_type == lookup("OBJ_IDEA_PROJECT_TYPE", "type100") ) || ( idea.thisIdea.obj_request_type == lookup("OBJ_IDEA_PROJECT_TYPE", "type400") ) || ( idea.thisIdea.obj_request_type == null)

nls.description: Idea Status is marked as rejected.
nls.name: Reject Project

nls.description: Status must first be set to Submitted For Approval before it can be set to Rejected
nls.name: Set Status to Submitted For Approval
